00022 #region Usings
00023 using System.Drawing;
00024 #endregion
00025 
00026 namespace Utilities.Media.Image
00027 {
00031     public class RGBHistogram
00032     {
00033         #region Constructors
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037         public RGBHistogram()
00038         {
00039         }
00040 
00045         public RGBHistogram(Bitmap Image)
00046         {
00047             LoadImage(Image);
00048         }
00049         #endregion
00050 
00051         #region Public Functions
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 
00056         public void LoadImage(Bitmap Image)
00057         {
00058             Width = Image.Width;
00059             Height = Image.Height;
00060             for (int x = 0; x < 256; ++x)
00061             {
00062                 R[x] = 0;
00063                 G[x] = 0;
00064                 B[x] = 0;
00065             }
00066             for (int x = 0; x < Image.Width; ++x)
00067             {
00068                 for (int y = 0; y < Image.Height; ++y)
00069                 {
00070                     Color TempColor = Image.GetPixel(x, y);
00071                     ++R[(int)TempColor.R];
00072                     ++G[(int)TempColor.G];
00073                     ++B[(int)TempColor.B];
00074                 }
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00081         public void Normalize()
00082         {
00083             float TotalPixels=Width*Height;
00084             for (int x = 0; x < 256; ++x)
00085             {
00086                 R[x] /= TotalPixels;
00087                 G[x] /= TotalPixels;
00088                 B[x] /= TotalPixels;
00089             }
00090         }
00091 
00095         public void Equalize()
00096         {
00097             float TotalPixels = Width * Height;
00098 
00099             float PreviousR = R[0];
00100             R[0] = R[0] * 256 / TotalPixels;
00101             float PreviousG = G[0];
00102             G[0] = G[0] * 256 / TotalPixels;
00103             float PreviousB = B[0];
00104             B[0] = B[0] * 256 / TotalPixels;
00105             for (int x = 1; x < 256; ++x)
00106             {
00107                 PreviousR += R[x];
00108                 PreviousG += G[x];
00109                 PreviousB += B[x];
00110                 R[x] = PreviousR * 256 / TotalPixels;
00111                 G[x] = PreviousG * 256 / TotalPixels;
00112                 B[x] = PreviousB * 256 / TotalPixels;
00113             }
00114             Width = 256;
00115             Height = 1;
00116         }
00117         #endregion
00118 
00119         #region Private Values
00120         private int Width;
00121         private int Height;
00122         #endregion
00123 
00124         #region Public Properties
00125 
00126 
00127 
00128         public float[] R
00129         {
00130             get { return _R; }
00131             set { _R = value; }
00132         }
00133         private float[] _R = new float[256];
00134 
00138         public float[] G
00139         {
00140             get { return _G; }
00141             set { _G = value; }
00142         }
00143         private float[] _G = new float[256];
00144 
00148         public float[] B
00149         {
00150             get { return _B; }
00151             set { _B = value; }
00152         }
00153         private float[] _B = new float[256];
00154         #endregion
00155     }
